reviews.review_msg: She inspired me to go further into linguistics. The course was engaging and really rewarding assignments.

i took LING 330 with her and i'd say its a gpa booster as long as we dont do the assignments in last mins. we didnt have any inclass exams or quizzes, but just one takehome exam/one assignment/RSP/final projects. her lecture isnt that fun but not that heavy either.

Easy take home midterm, just don't leave it until the last minute. This is more of a hands on class where you learn through doing. The research project was really interesting because we could choose our own topics and the paper was fun to write. No in-class exams and the marking is very lenient. Never picked up the textbook. The TA was great too.
The worst prof.in my whole life.. just avoid his class is the smartest way..
Caldecott was incredibly helpfull to me in my career pursuits and is an engaging lecturer. She is quite the character too.

Grading is unclear.  provides a scale but actually curves the marks. exams are not representative of the material; easy questions get you same # of marks than hard ones. the most science-like ling course, yet, you will struggle as the material gets airy fairy.

I took LING221 and LING330 with Marion. Her lectures are easy to follow, clear and she's also pretty funny. There are weekly quizzes, homework assignments in addition to the exams. All three have a group component to them. She is super nice, approachable and takes the time to get to know her students. Her exams are tricky though, so do be prepared.

The course topics are very interesting , however, Dr. Caldecott makes seem material easier than what is actually is. The exams are not  well designed and lab questions sometimes  unclear or info scattered all over. She is very approachable and friendly but  sometimes  the only help I got was to be referred to the learning commons (3.5 CGPA tho)
Group exams are the best things ever ;)

she is a nice lady with passion all the time. her exams and homework are not easy. she likes to quiz on your previewing. it is easy to argue some points back from her if you can state your ideas. Your final grade will always HIGHER than your expectation, so don't worry too much in the middle of the semester if u feeling bad.
She is very kind. Since she just completed her PhD program, she is very motivated and hard working. She helps a lot if you try to learn. Exams are fair and she usually give you a good study guide.

She is a very nicer person, since she just completed her PhD program, she is very motivated and hard working. She helps a lot if you try to learn. Exams are not fair and she usually give you good study guide.
Difficult class. Horrible textbook. But Marion really cares about her students so she'll help you through.

She's new but she's a very nice person and her midterm exams aren't bad if you are good at memorizing things. Her questions on spectrogram analysis are crazy so make sure you know how to do those before you do the final.
